news.title: Trump reverses stance on Epstein records, presses Republicans to support release
news.description: U.S. President Donald Trump has called on Congressional Republicans to vote to release files related to deceased convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein.

news.title: Stock futures are little changed to start the week: Live updates
news.description: The moves followed a choppy week in which valuation fears, a rotation within the market and a recalibration of Fed rate cut expectations pressured the AI trade.

news.title: All three of the core premises behind the bull market are coming under questioning
news.description: Mike Santoli breaks down the recent turbulence seen in the market and whether it is a sign of a bigger washout to come.
